As an elected member for the Batley West Ward, I am here to support you with issues that may exist within the community.
surgerydetails.line2: Depending on what it is you need help with, I may be able to help directly, sign-post you to the relevant council service, or put you in touch with a local service or organisation that can provide the advice and guidance you may need.
surgerydetails.line3: Please contact me on the number or email address provided.
surgerydetails.line4: I look forward to hearing from you.
